Package de.lmu.ifi.nm.www

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INetworkAgent
    This interface defines a network agent.
    ISatellite
    Java RMI Interface for the Satellite class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CiscoAgent
    The CiscoAgent is the implementation of a network agent and is instantiated by the Satellite.
    Conv  
    FreePort
    Find a not-taken port on localhost.
    Iandr  
    Link
    This class represents a link in the topology graph.
    NetworkPrefix
    This class represents the combination of network address and prefix length, e.g. 10.1.0.0/24.
    RMIRegistry
    Graceful RMI registry creation/reuse.
    Satellite
    The Satellite ... ... manages the LAN of a specific site with the help of its network agents. ... receives events from the TopologyDiscoverer, e.g.
    Subtool
    API to deal with classful subnetting.
    Vertex
    This class represents a vertex in the topology graph.
